orego.book

Interface OpeningBook

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombinedBook, FusekiBook, JosekiBook, StarPointsBook

    public interface OpeningBook
    A book which quickly finds good moves during the opening.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int nextMove(Board board)
      Returns the next move in the opening book or NO_POINT if the book has been exhausted.

    • Method Detail

      • nextMove

        int nextMove(Board board)
        Returns the next move in the opening book or NO_POINT if the book has been exhausted.
